body_html:
Thanks!

With a little more investigation found that this fails on ppc64le only for the data_format "NCHW", for the other data format ("NHWC") it passes (data_formats as passed as input to tf.nn.avg_pool in test case file ./compiler/tests/pooling_ops_test.py). Investigating this further, if could get any suggestions/pointers to why this may be happening that would be great!

body:
Thanks! 

With a little more investigation found that this fails on ppc64le only for the data_format "NCHW", for the other data format ("NHWC") it passes (data_formats as passed as input to tf.nn.avg_pool in test case file ./compiler/tests/pooling_ops_test.py). Investigating this further, if could get any suggestions/pointers to why this may be happening that would be great!
